abstract: An insider trading investigation will head into corporate boardrooms.
snippet: An insider trading investigation will head into corporate boardrooms.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, a federal grand jury in Manhattan charged former McKinsey head Rajat K. Gupta with one count of conspiracy to commit securities fraud and five counts of securities fraud, The New York Times' Deal book reports.

headline.main: With Gupta's Arrest, Insider Inquiry Goes Beyond Wall St.
